name: Love Monster (TheRealMattKain)
description:
A melancholy clicker with no reward other than love and monsters. Featuring glorious art by my school-aged cousin. This is our second collaboration. This started as a piece that she was working on as part of a calendar for 2023. We turned it into an odd little interactive. Turn on audio for full sadness.

GAMEPLAY
Click things.  See what happens.

CONTROLS
click/tap: INTERACT with love monster
